data.title: UFC Tybura vs Spivac 2 Card: Who will fight on UFC Fight Night?
data.meta_description: The UFC returns to Las Vegas this Saturday, Aug. 10 after a pair of international stops in Manchester and Abu Dhabi, and it will do so with a lineup that, while lacking its biggest
data.text:
The UFC returns to Las Vegas this Saturday, Aug. 10 after a pair of international stops in Manchester and Abu Dhabi, and it will do so with a lineup that, while lacking its biggest names, will feature bouts with up-and-coming fighters looking to climb the rankings in their respective divisions.

The evening at UFC Apex in Las Vegas will be headlined by a rematch between Poland's Marcin Tybura and Moldova's Serghei Spivac, who is looking for revenge after losing a unanimous decision in his first bout in 2020 at heavyweight.

Tybura (25-8) has won 8 of his last 10 fights, so at 39 years of age he has become an experienced fighter who maximizes his qualities and knows how to spot his opponent's mistakes.

For his part, since losing to Tybura, Spivac (16-4) had gone three fights without defeat until he lost to Frenchman Ciryl Gane in Paris.

The co-main event features Damon Jackson and Chepe Mariscal, two veterans looking to put their names in the rankings, in what promises to be an intense fight to prove they can be considered among the best featherweights in the world.

UFC Vegas 95 Tybura vs. Spivac 2 card

The UFC Vegas 95 card is headlined by the Marcin Tybura vs Serghei Spivac bout, and includes up-and-coming names looking to make strides in their respective divisions:

Marcin Tybura vs Serghei Spivac - Heavyweight

Damon Jackson vs Chepe Mariscal - Featherweight

Danny Barlow vs Nikolay Veretennikov - Welterweight

Chris Gutierrez vs Quang Le - Bantamweight

Yana Santos vs Chelsea Chandler - Bantamweight

Toshiomi Kazama vs Charalampos Grigoriou - Bantamweight

Preliminary Card

Karol Rosa vs Pannie Kianzad - Bantamweight

Jhonata Diniz vs Karl Williams - Heavyweight

Youssef Zalal vs Jarno Errens - Featherweight

Stephanie Luciano vs Talita Alencar - Flyweight

How and where to watch UFC Fight Night: Tybura vs Spivac 2 on TV in the USA?

The UFC 95 show from the UFC APEX in Las Vegas, Nevada next Saturday, can be followed in the United States on ESPN / ESPN+, starting at 7:00 pm (US Eastern Time) and the prelims from 5 pm.
